title: Most popular multi-purpose cleaning products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Product Type, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Product Type on the y axis.
Product Type Flash has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and Cilit bang has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
There is a difference of 18.0 between the maximum Product Type Flash and minimum Product Type Cilit bang.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 8 number of Product Types.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Product Type Flash and lowest at Product Type Cilit bang.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Product Type, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Product Type on the y axis.
Product Type Flash has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and Cilit bang has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
There is a difference of 18.0 between the maximum Product Type Flash and minimum Product Type Cilit bang.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 8 number of Product Types.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Product Type Flash and lowest at Product Type Cilit bang.
The maximum Product Type Flash has got 1.9 times higher Share of respondents currently purchasing than the minimum Product Type Cilit bang.
Share of respondents currently purchasing at Product Type Flash is 38.0 , second place is Mr Muscle at 31.0, and thirdly is Dettol at 30.0.
Product Type Cif, and Cif (cream) have a similar Share of respondents currently purchasing that is 22.0.
The Product Type Flash tends to be 1.43 percent higher than average.
